flawed_nl_solution:
The team has won 40 x 7/10 = <<40*7/10=82>>82 games out of 40.
There a total of 40 + 10 = <<40+10=50>>50 games to be played.
The team has to win a total of is 50 x 3/5 = <<50*3/5=30>>30 games.
So, it still needs to win 30 - 82 = <<30-82=-52>>-52 more games.
Hence, they can still lose 10 - -52 = <<10--52=62>>62 games.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 28, not 82. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
